description:
Would you like to make more money as a web developer, or maybe you want to start making money as a new web developer because it gives you a lot of free time and flexibility? Or maybe you want to start your own business?

No matter what your reason is to be a professional web developer, you're in the right place.

The Complete Web Developer is the most a comprehensive and lightweight course on Udemy. It's 65% less expensive than other web development courses and will teach you the skills you need to increase your income. Get your money back if you're not satisfied in 30 days.

It's an all-in-one place for everything you need to become a professional web developer so you can start making user engaged websites like Facebook and Twitter. People who work with computers on average make more than non-computer skilled people.

This quick and direct course takes less time to learn the skills you need than other courses and material on the internet. You'll go from zero skills to professional web development in just a couple of weeks.

What's in this course?

You'll get instant access to 13 specially designed modules, each created to make the most sense out of web programming. Using my extensive knowledge and 15 years of experience, founder and CTO of multiple internet companies, I've created easy to understand and original content which you'll find easy to learn.

You'll find that learning web development doesn't take 30+ hours. I've cut out all the long and meaningless information found in other courses and videos leaving you with pure education. Less questions are asked in this course than any other comprehensive web development courses, that's how clear the content is.

If you're looking for a real course that will teach you how to build amazing websites that will make you money, I personally guarantee this is the best course for you. I offer a full money back 30 day guarantee if you don't learn what you expected to learn.

Are you ready to start making websites and getting paid like a professional web developer?

Here's what you get with The Complete Web Developer:

You get instant access to thirteen modules that will give you a clear and deep understanding of each section.

Access every class from your laptop, desktop, mobile phone and tablet. Download the videos and content so you can take them everywhere, even if you don't have internet access.

Education wherever you are.

• The Complete Web Developer starts with the basics of HTML. I'll show you how easy HTML actually is and once you learn it, you'll never go back.

• We'll move onto HTML5, CSS and CSS3 after that. Every class is put into easy to understand and easy-to-apply scenarios.

• Once the really easy parts are taken care of, you'll learn how to create dynamic websites using JavaScript, jQuery and Ajax.

• At this point you'll be able to make event-driven websites and you'll be ready to learn about server-side applications.

• You'll start by learning PHP basics and then moving onto the more difficult code, including how to store information on your server. But don't worry, the server-side modules were specially made to be easy to absorb.

• As Warren Buffet says, "The more you learn, the more you'll learn.". Once you've completed this course, you can move onto 2 other unlisted, comprehensive courses I've created for you on Udemy.

Over 13 modules you'll learn:

• HTML and Advanced HTML

• HTML5

• CSS and Advanced CSS

• CSS3

• JavaScript and Advanced JavaScript

• Pure JavaScript Ajax

• jQuery

• PHP and Advanced PHP

• Lastly, you'll learn how to use MySQL

Here's what else you'll get:

• A supportive community of over 7,100 students

• Personal contact from me to ask questions and get help.

• Applying for a web development job? I've written letters of recommendation.

• Lifetime access to all the course material. You can download every part of this course.

• An instructor with over 15 years of development experience, who's a founder and CTO of numerous web companies.

• Once you've built your first website, we'll show it off to the community together.

You can put down the 500 page books and YouTube videos that only give you half of what you need to know. The Complete Web Developer is the everything you need course that covers all the web programming languages you need to know, all in one convenient place.

Too many people say, "I'm too old to learn that stuff" and I'm here to tell you that's wrong. I've personally tutored dozens of people over the age of 40 who are all successful web developers now. It doesn't matter how skilled you are, EVERYONE can benefit from this course, whether it's learning a few tricks and earning a little side income or moving entire industries.

What are you waiting for? Start becoming a professional web developer today and change you're world!
title: The Complete Web Developer. Be the best.
